channel.title: Community on DARKMATTER
channel.description: Recent content in Community on DARKMATTER

item.title: The enemy stares at you from the mirror
item.description: Inherited Misnomers Of course, we did once enjoy the thrill that came with an escapade with our cousin, only to rat on her later at the dining table or feign ignorance when she got thrashed by her parents, while our eyes met for a fraction of a second. Of course. We do remember how we felt when our parents found us a seat in the plushest college in the city while the person whom we called “best friend” had to find work after school.
